issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: There are many methods overlapping between PBHelper and HdfsProtoUtil. This jira combines these two helper classes.
fields.summary: Combine PBHelper and HdfsProtoUtil and remove redundant methods

comments.body:

Nicholas, sorry for making you review unnecessarily large patch, due to eclipse auto-formatting :-)
